department: Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services Gouvernementaux (SPAC)
description: Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of Pallet Racking. Tenders are invited for the provision of Mid-Range Industrial Cabinets or Drawers or Shelving. This is a national procurement process, meaning that bids form any Canadian company/ individual are welcome. Canadian businesses who have a valid Interpretive Memorandum on file with TPSGC have automatic access to the contracting entity.            Briefly, bids for this procurement might include:    Pallet Racking (Standard) One pricing option may be the required 7’ tall x 3’ wide pallet rack, one 5’ wide by 8’ tall, etc.).
